main-page.quotation: The greatest value of the state are the people who create them. Our company is constantly guided by this principle. Thanks to original approach and innovative solutions, we help foreigners in immigration and in-country issues effectively.

offert.header: MISTI is experienced team of consultants has been providing expert legal advice for many years. Our customers' satisfaction is our success, therefore our goal is to satisfy you. Our experience, know-how and office practices makes us the perfect choice to handle any type of case.

section1.title: Immigration
section1.val0: Assistance in obtaining a Polish visa
section1.val1: Prolonging any type of visa in Poland
section1.val7: Assistance in obtaining a work permit
section1.val8: Assistance in adapting to a new place of residence

section2.title: Intra-state issues
section2.val6: Assistance in searching for apartments, houses and schools

offert.footer: Nasi współpracownicy pomagają w wypełnieniu wniosków wizowych, zebraniu potrzebnych dokumentów i utrzymywaniu stałego kontaktu z pracownikami. Współpracują także w naszym imieniu z miejscowymi urzędami, na bieżąco monitorując proces uzyskiwania niezbędnych dokumentów. W przypadku nieznajomości języka polskiego zapewniamy pomoc tłumacza w języku angielskim, ukraińskim, lub rosyjskim.

contact.header: Do you need assistance in obtaining a work permit?
contact.sub-header: Here you will learn how to legalize your stay, get a work permit, invite a foreigner to our country, become a Polish citizen.

form.title: We also encourage you to contact our department directly using the form below:
form.thanks: Thank you for your message! We will be in touch shortly.
